p: The network representation of the salmon and trout aquaculture industry in GB comprises 3517 geographical sites, of which 791 are interpreted here as farm sites. The England and Wales sub-network contains 2441 distinct sites, and the Scottish sub-network comprises 1076 distinct sites. A subset of 3287 sites have transport records in the database: 2423 in England and Wales and 864 in Scotland. These can be further broken down into designated farm sites and other sites as illustrated in Fig. 1.
